page.title: 10A New Surgery in Chelmsford
page.content: The{doctor's surgery at Newlands {Spring}only opened in March this year and so far only looks after{500 {patients,}so the doctor has another practice in Chelmsford. She also makes {house visits}to see people who are disabled.She has a job at{St.John's {Hospital}treating chronically ill patients and spends much of her time, even her day off,examining people at other hospitals.She also has many {medical meetings}to attend. The doctor feels that the most important part of her job is{listening {to people}and looking after them while {"nature heals them herself."}She has two children and a number of hobbies which help her to take her mind off her work.She is gradually getting to know many of the people in the area and is of{great value to the families {of Newlands Spring.
